original_text: A descendant of Jesse will appear, like a new branch that grows from a tree stump. The roots of the tree will give new fruit!
korean_text: 이새의 줄기에서 한 싹이 나며 그 뿌리에서 한 가지가 나서 결실할 것이요

sentences.original_text: A descendant of Jesse will appear
like a new branch that grows from a tree stump
The roots of the tree will give new fruit
sentences.korean_translation: 나무의 뿌리가 새로운 열매를 맺을 것입니다
